short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take quick notes right within your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension lets you write notes easily as you use your browser. Save your ideas quickly and clear them when you're done. It's easy to use and helps you remember important things while you're online.
